1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Urwah bin Mughirah bin Shu'bah from his father Mughirah bin Shu'bah, that:The Messenger of Allah went out to relieve himself, and Mughirah followed him with a vessel of water. When he finished relieving himself, he performed ablution and wiped over his leather socks

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمَسْحِ عَلَى الْخُفَّيْنِ
